mission.title: Mission
mission.text1: Sirius Semiconductors was established <1>to reach an ambitious target</1> to turn Vietnam into a technological powerhouse.
mission.text2: We are here <1>to provide expertise, technologies, service and products in microelectronics</1> for partners in a Vietnamese market and way beyond

icDesign.title: IC Design Services
icDesign.content: Full-cycle IC design services, from specification to GDSII. We offer both digital and analog design, verification, and physical design services. Our expertise spans across various technology nodes, from mature 180nm to cutting-edge 28nm and below.

riscV.title: RISC-V CPU cores:
riscV.description: a range of 32-bit and 64-bit cores for different applications

dma.title: DMA controllers:
dma.description: high-performance, configurable DMA for various use-cases

sram.title: SRAM/DRAM controllers:
sram.description: efficient memory controllers for on-chip and off-chip memory

software.title: Software development
software.content: <0>Firmware and drivers:</0> we develop low-level software for our SoCs, including bootloaders, firmware, and drivers for various operating systems (Linux, RTOS). <1>SDK and BSP:</1> we provide comprehensive Software Development Kits (SDKs) and Board Support Packages (BSPs) to enable our customers to start developing their applications right away. <2>AI/ML software:</2> we have expertise in developing and optimizing AI/ML software for our AI-accelerated SoCs, including model porting, quantization, and performance tuning.
